title: Can't leave Reconnect Screen.
body:
First of all i want to say that if this was posted somewhere else already, i'm sorry i searched everywhere but couldn't find anything.
So about 3-4 hours ago i finished a ranked game that was a win and when i pressed continue on the victory screen, the game just closed.
No messages, no warning, nothing.After i logged in again, i was surprised to see this:
https://gyazo.com/9edbb4c7ff44b43981e6a17bea55cef4
I can't connect to the chat or even reconnect to the ''game in progress'' that is already finished.
If i try to reconnect it's just a black screen and if i close it, it says that my game crashed.
It would help me a lot if someone could clarify the situation for me.
Thanks.

EDIT 1 : I just checked my match history and saw that my last game isn't there.If i didn't receive any lp for winning would be a big shame since it was a really close match.

replies.body:
It sounds like you experienced a *ghost game*, which occurs when there's a hiccup with the game server when it goes to report the results of the match. In some cases, the match that this occurred after won't be recorded by the server, so you may have been affected by that in your ranked standing.

This situation normally doesn't last longer than a few hours, so let me know if you're still experiencing this.
